channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Universal Music Group, a massive holding of Bill Ackman, sees stock-price tumble on streaming worries
item.description: Shares in Universal Music Group, a big holding of Bill Ackmanâ€™s Pershing Square Capital Management, lost more than a quarter of its value on Thursday on concerns over streaming revenue.

item.title: Ford shares tumble 13% after massive earnings miss
item.description: The automaker increased its target for free cash flow but maintained its 2024 earnings guidance, disappointing some investors who had hoped for a hike.

item.title: Philippines battles to contain oil spill as tanker sinks, leaving one dead
item.description: A tanker carrying 1.4 million liters of industrial fuel sank off the coast of Philippines, leading to one casualty and a vast oil spill.

item.title: Southwest Airlines to move ahead with assigned seating and premium seating options
Southwest to get rid of open seating, offer extra legroom in biggest shift in its history
item.description: Southwest is under pressure to drum up revenue from an oversupplied U.S. market and an activist investor.

item.title: Southwest profit falls 46% as airline takes 'urgent' steps to increase revenue
item.description: Southwest is under pressure from an activist investor after it lagged competitors.

item.description: A Morgan Stanley fund crunched the numbers on companies that do buybacks while awarding employees stock

item.title: Jeep, Dodge-maker Stellantis reports 48% drop in first-half net profit on weak U.S. sales
item.description: Auto giant Stellantis on Thursday reported a steep drop in first-half net profit, citing reduced volumes and lower market share in North America.

item.title: S&P 500 futures slip after worst day for benchmark since 2022: Live updates
item.description: Wednesday's trading session saw intense declines across major U.S. stock indexes that were driven by disappointing reports from a couple megacap tech names.

item.title: Oil prices fall after another China rate cut underlines demand worries
item.description: Oil futures fell early Thursday after Chinaâ€™s central bank delivered another cut to rates, underlining worries about demand from the worldâ€™s second largest crude consumer.

item.title: India is on alert after a fresh outbreak of the deadly Nipah virus. Hereâ€™s what you need to know
item.description: Health authorities in the southern Indian state of Kerala are on high alert for the latest in a series of outbreaks of the incurable Nipah virus.

item.title: Coinbase UK unit fined $4.5 million by British regulator over 'high-risk' customer breaches
item.description: U.K. regulators fined Coinbase's U.K. arm Â£3.5 million ($4.5 million) on Thursday over breaches of a voluntary agreement designed to stop the cryptocurrency exchange onboarding "high-risk customers.

item.title: Nestle and Unilever see share prices diverge on rival price hiking strategies
item.description: Nestle hiked its prices at a faster rate than its rival Unilever in a strategy that saw the Swiss firmâ€™s revenue drop as its British competitor posted an increase in its sales over the same period

item.title: Obama plans to endorse Harris for president soon
item.description: The former president has had multiple conversations with Vice President Kamala Harris about her campaign this week.

item.title: Revolut clinches UK banking license, ending three-year wait
item.description: British fintech startup Revolut on Thursday that it had received a preliminary banking license with restrictions, bringing to an end a three-year wait.
